reviewComments: The gentleman was very nice and explained everything to us. He answered all our questions and even let us touch and learn about the exhibits!
Friendly and not badly priced... had a coffee from the coffee shop and it was great!! We also loved what they had to offer in the little gift shop.. will be back to buy a hoodie... read more
